select r.registrationnum , ms.alumni , ms.classroom , mb.name , r.registerResult , r.registrationcontent , r.estimatedtime , r.registrationdate , r.registrationReason from registration r , memberstudent ms , memberbasic mb where
(r.id in (select id from memberbasic where name like '%' || #{ searchText} || '%' )) and
ms.alumni = #{ selAlumni } and
ms.classroom = #{ selClassroom } and
r.id = ms.id and ms.id = mb.id order by r.registrationnum desc
